ЁЯП░
New Capital

Original name was Damodarasena. He established a new capital named 'Pravarapura'.

ЁЯУЪ
Setubandha

He is considered the author of the Prakrit poem 'Setubandha' (or Ravana vadha), which is based on Lord Rama's conquest of Lanka. It is said that Kalidasa helped him write it.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Kalidasa: According to some scholars, Kalidasa composed 'Meghaduta' in the Vakataka court itself.
  • Religion: He was a devotee of Shiva (Paramamaheshwara).
